Package business

Class CharacterManager

java.lang.Object
business.CharacterManager
public class CharacterManager extends Object
This class is to manage all the logic regarding an charactersCharacterGame.

    • setCharacterDAO

      public void setCharacterDAO(int option)
      Setter method to set the interface of the characterDAO CharacterDAO to be used.

    • validateName

      public String validateName(String name)
      Method to validate if an inputted name is valid or not to be a characterCharacterGame name and make the proper modifications.
      Parameters:
      name - string containing the name to be analyzed.
      Returns:
      the name with the proper modifications if it is valid. 1 if it is not valid.

    • isUniqueName

      public boolean isUniqueName(String name)
      Method to check if an inputted characterCharacterGame name is unique or not.
      Parameters:
      name - string containing the name to be analyzed.
      Returns:
      true if it is unique, false if it is not.

    • isUniqueName

      public boolean isUniqueName(String name, List<CharacterGame> characters)
      Method to check if an inputted characterCharacterGame name is unique or not. Compared to a given list of characters.
      Parameters:
      name - string containing the name to be analyzed.
      characters - a list of character CharacterGame instances to which the name inputted is going to be compared.
      Returns:
      true if it is unique, false if it is not.

    • calculateXp

      public int calculateXp(int level)
      Method to calculate the xp a character CharacterGame has based on the level it has.
      Parameters:
      level - integer containing a value representing the level.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the xp the level corresponds to.

    • calculateLevel

      public int calculateLevel(int xp)
      Method to calculate the level a character CharacterGame has based on the xp it has.
      Parameters:
      xp - integer containing a value representing the xp.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the level the xp corresponds to.

    • generateStats

      public int[] generateStats()
      Method to throw two six sides dice for each stat of a characterCharacterGame.
      Returns:
      an array of integer values representing the value each dice got.

    • calculateStats

      public int[] calculateStats(int[] randomValues)
      Method to calculate each stat value based on the sum of the 2 dice thrown for each character CharacterGame stat.
      Parameters:
      randomValues - integer array with the values of the 2 dice thrown for each stat.
      Returns:
      an array of integer values representing the value of each stat(body, mind, spirit).

    • createCharacter

      public void createCharacter(String name, String player, int level, int[] stats, String classType)
      Method to create a characterCharacterGame and persist it.
      Parameters:
      name - string containing the character CharacterGame name.
      player - string containing the name of the player who owns the characterCharacterGame.
      level - integer containing the level of the characterCharacterGame.
      stats - array of integer values representing each stat value(body, mind, spirit).

    • deleteCharacter

      public void deleteCharacter(String characterName, int source)
      Method to remove a character CharacterGame from the character list and persist it.
      Parameters:
      characterName - string containing the name of the character CharacterGame to be removed.
      source - integer containing the characters that is going to be deleted.

    • getCharacters

      public List<CharacterGame> getCharacters()
      Method to get all the characterCharacterGame instances stored in the system.
      Returns:
      a list containing all the character CharacterGame instances.

    • getCharacters

      public List<CharacterGame> getCharacters(String input)
      Method to get all the character CharacterGame instances owned by the same player.
      Parameters:
      input - string containing the name of the player or part of it.
      Returns:
      a lits of the character CharacterGame instances owned by that player.

    • checkNumCharacters

      public int checkNumCharacters()
      Method to check the number of character CharacterGame instances stored in the system.
      Returns:
      an integer value representing the number of character CharacterGame instances it has.

    • preparationStage

      public String preparationStage(List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method with the logic regarding the actions each character CharacterGame instance will do during the preparation stage.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances participating in an adventure.
      Returns:
      a string containing the action each characterCharacterGame did and its result.

    • rollInitiative

      public void rollInitiative(List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method to calculate the initiative of each character CharacterGame of the party.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances participating in an adventure.

    • sortInitiative

      public void sortInitiative(List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method to sort the party membersCharacterGame in the order in which they will attack.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances participating in an adventure.

    • initializeHitPoints

      public void initializeHitPoints(List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method to calculate the maximum hit points of each character CharacterGame of the party and initialize its hit points.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances participating in an adventure.

    • partyIsAlive

      public boolean partyIsAlive(List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method to check if the party is alive or not.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances participating in an adventure.
      Returns:
      true if at least one character CharacterGame of the party is alive, false if none is alive.

    • updateLevel

      public void updateLevel(List<CharacterGame> party, int source)
      Method to add the experience points gained after an encounter to each member of the party and update its level if necessary.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances participating in an adventure.
      source - persistence source where the characters CharacterGame are stored.
